short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Biblica is a bible browser extension, that displays Bible passages by selecting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Bible Browser extension that displays Bible passages when you select a keyword or Bible reference. The application works with Chrome browsers, and comes in several Bible versions and languages. It is built to help people get Bible passages and do word search while reading online.
